title: Strengthening Medical Practical Skills: Instructional Design for Cultural Diversity-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain cultural contexts through three or more design cases derived from Yoruba, Gujarati, and Algerian cultural spaces
Learners can investigate case studies of non-Western designers' contributions and evaluate their influence on contemporary design
Learners can propose design solutions applicable to real-world work environments using a cultural diversity approach
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
